name: Summon Defense (Cherry Game Jam - 2017)
description:
Description:

Build towers to defend the core from the dungeon dwelling enemies.  Be careful, your units cannot attack enemies that don't match their own color. Keep a close eye on your units to make sure no enemies manage to easily slip past you.

Credits:

Created by Tyler Rankin (website)

Music: Morgan Casey (website)

Font: Chequered Ink (website)
